export var getEMPTotalTax =(gender,tsal) =>{ var taxpercent = 0; if(gender =='male') { if(tsal >=100000) { taxpercent = 10; } else if(tsal >= 50000){ taxpercent = 5; } }else{ // female if(tsal >= 100000){ taxpercent = 5; } else if (tsal >= 500000){ taxpercent = 0; } } vAR totalTAXTObepaid = (tsal*taxpercent)/100; return totalTAXTObepaid; } export var count=90; var getcommunicationwithgovsite =() =>{ }
